trans-unit.source: Contains multiple modules related to management of content
trans-unit.target: Contains multiple modules related to management of content
Tạo một không gian làm việc mới
Chỉnh sửa không gian làm việc
Vâng, xóa không gian làm việc này
Chỉnh sửa không gian làm việc
Không gian làm việc cá nhân

trans-unit.source: Only reviewers and administrators can access and modify this workspace
trans-unit.target: Chỉ có người đánh giá và quản trị viên có thể truy cập và chỉnh sửa không gian làm việc này

trans-unit.source: Any logged in editor can see and modify this workspace.
trans-unit.target: Any logged in editor can see and modify this workspace.
Mở trang trong không gian làm việc "{0}"

trans-unit.source: This is your personal workspace which you can't delete.
trans-unit.target: Đây là không gian làm việc cá nhân mà bạn không thể xóa.

trans-unit.source: The workspace contains changes. To delete, discard the changes first.
trans-unit.target: The workspace contains changes. To delete, discard the changes first.

trans-unit.source: Workspace can't be rebased on a different workspace because it still contains changes.
trans-unit.target: Workspace can't be rebased on a different workspace because it still contains changes.

trans-unit.source: The workspace cannot be deleted because other workspaces depend on it.
trans-unit.target: The workspace cannot be deleted because other workspaces depend on it.

trans-unit.source: You don't have the permissions for deleting this workspace.
trans-unit.target: You don't have the permissions for deleting this workspace.

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to delete the workspace "{0}"?
trans-unit.target: Do you really want to delete the workspace "{0}"?

trans-unit.source: This will delete the workspace including all unpublished content. This operation cannot be undone.
trans-unit.target: This will delete the workspace including all unpublished content. This operation cannot be undone.

trans-unit.source: This module contains the overview of all elements within the current workspace and it enables to continue the review and publishing workflow for them.
trans-unit.target: This module contains the overview of all elements within the current workspace and it enables to continue the review and publishing workflow for them.
Bỏ các thay đổi đã lựa chọn
Công khai các thay đổi đã lựa chọn
Loại bỏ tất cả thay đổi
Công khai tất cả thay đổi
Công khai tất cả thay đổi đến {0}

trans-unit.source: There are no unpublished changes in this workspace.
trans-unit.target: Không có những thay đổi không được công khai trong không gian làm việc này

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to discard all changes in the "{0}" workspace?
trans-unit.target: Bạn có thực sự muốn hủy bỏ tất cả những thay đổi trong không gian làm việc "{0}"

trans-unit.source: A workspace with this title already exists.
trans-unit.target: Không gian làm việc với tiêu đề này đã tồn tại
Không gian làm việc "{0}" đã được cập nhật

trans-unit.source: Workspace "{0}" cannot be deleted because the following workspaces are based on it: {1}
trans-unit.target: Workspace "{0}" cannot be deleted because the following workspaces are based on it: {1}

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while fetching unpublished nodes from workspace "{0}", nothing was deleted.
trans-unit.target: An error occurred while fetching unpublished nodes from workspace "{0}", nothing was deleted.

trans-unit.source: Your personal workspace contains changes, please publish or discard them first.
trans-unit.target: Your personal workspace contains changes, please publish or discard them first.

trans-unit.source: Did not delete workspace "{0}" because it currently contains {1} nodes.
trans-unit.target: Did not delete workspace "{0}" because it currently contains {1} nodes.
Không gian làm việc "{0}" đã bị gỡ bỏ

trans-unit.source: The selected change has been published.
trans-unit.target: Thay đổi đã chọn đã được công khai

trans-unit.source: The selected change has been discarded.
trans-unit.target: Sự thay đổi đã chọn đã bị hủy bỏ

trans-unit.source: The selected changes have been published.
trans-unit.target: Những thay đổi đã chọn đã được công khai

trans-unit.source: The selected changes have been discarded.
trans-unit.target: Những thay đổi đã chọn đã bị hủy bỏ

trans-unit.source: All changes from workspace "{0}" have been published to {1}.
trans-unit.target: Tất cả thay đổi từ không gian làm việc "{0}" đã được công khai đến {1}.

trans-unit.source: All changes from workspace "{0}" have been discarded.
trans-unit.target: Tất cả thay đổi từ không gian làm việc "{0}" đã bị hủy bỏ.

trans-unit.source: Drag and drop an asset on a collection / tag to add them to it.
trans-unit.target: Drag and drop an asset on a collection / tag to add them to it.

trans-unit.source: This module allows managing of media assets including pictures, videos, audio and documents.
trans-unit.target: This module allows managing of media assets including pictures, videos, audio and documents.

trans-unit.source: This module provides an overview of all relevant events affecting this Neos installation.
trans-unit.target: This module provides an overview of all relevant events affecting this Neos installation.

trans-unit.source: Here's what happened recently in Neos
trans-unit.target: Here's what happened recently in Neos

trans-unit.source: There have not been recorded any events yet which could be displayed in this history.
trans-unit.target: There have not been recorded any events yet which could be displayed in this history.

trans-unit.source: This node has been removed in the meantime
trans-unit.target: This node has been removed in the meantime

trans-unit.source: Contains multiple modules related to administration
trans-unit.target: Có nhiều mô-đun liên quan đến quản trị

trans-unit.source: The User Management module provides you with an overview of all backend users. You can group them by their properties so you are able to monitor their permissions, filemounts, member groups etc.. This module is an indispensable tool in order to make sure the users are correctly configured.
trans-unit.target: mô-đun quản lý người dùng cung cấp cho bạn một tổng quan về tất cả các người dùng phụ trợ. Bạn có thể nhóm chúng bằng tài sản của họ, do đó, bạn có thể theo dõi các quyền của mình, filemounts, thành viên nhóm v.v... Mô-đun này là một công cụ không thể thiếu để đảm bảo rằng những người sử dụng được cấu hình đúng.
Sử dụng hệ thống mặc định
Thông tin chi tiết cho người dùng

trans-unit.source: You are logged in as this user and you cannot delete yourself.
trans-unit.target: You are logged in as this user and you cannot delete yourself.

trans-unit.source: Click here to delete this user
trans-unit.target: Click here to delete this user

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to delete the user "{0}"?
trans-unit.target: Do you really want to delete the user "{0}"?

trans-unit.source: This will delete the user, the related accounts and his personal workspace, including all unpublished content.
trans-unit.target: This will delete the user, the related accounts and his personal workspace, including all unpublished content.

trans-unit.source: The username can't be changed via the user interface
trans-unit.target: The username can't be changed via the user interface

trans-unit.source: You are logged in as this user and you cannot delete yourself.
trans-unit.target: You are logged in as this user and you cannot delete yourself.

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to delete the user "{0}"?
trans-unit.target: Do you really want to delete the user "{0}"?

trans-unit.source: This will delete the user, the related accounts and his personal workspace, including all unpublished content.
trans-unit.target: This will delete the user, the related accounts and his personal workspace, including all unpublished content.

trans-unit.source: The Package Management module provides you with an overview of all packages. You can activate and deactivate individual packages, import new packages and delete existing packages. It also provides you with the ability to freeze and unfreeze packages in development context.
trans-unit.target: The Package Management module provides you with an overview of all packages. You can activate and deactivate individual packages, import new packages and delete existing packages. It also provides you with the ability to freeze and unfreeze packages in development context.

trans-unit.source: This package is currently frozen. Click to unfreeze it.
trans-unit.target: This package is currently frozen. Click to unfreeze it.

trans-unit.source: Freeze the package in order to speed up your website.
trans-unit.target: Freeze the package in order to speed up your website.

trans-unit.source: This package is protected and cannot be deactivated.
trans-unit.target: This package is protected and cannot be deactivated.

trans-unit.source: This package is protected and cannot be deleted.
trans-unit.target: This package is protected and cannot be deleted.

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to delete "{0}"?
trans-unit.target: Do you really want to delete "{0}"?

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to delete the selected packages?
trans-unit.target: Do you really want to delete the selected packages?

trans-unit.source: The Sites Management module provides you with an overview of all sites. You can edit, add and delete information about your sites, such as adding a new domain.
trans-unit.target: The Sites Management module provides you with an overview of all sites. You can edit, add and delete information about your sites, such as adding a new domain.

trans-unit.source: The Configuration module provides you with an overview of all configuration types.
trans-unit.target: The Configuration module provides you with an overview of all configuration types.

trans-unit.source: This module allows you to customize your backend user profile. Here you can change your active system language, name and email address. You may also configure other general features in the system.
trans-unit.target: This module allows you to customize your backend user profile. Here you can change your active system language, name and email address. You may also configure other general features in the system.

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to delete
trans-unit.target: Do you really want to delete

trans-unit.source: Click to add a new Electronic address
trans-unit.target: Click to add a new Electronic address
Sắp xếp theo lần sửa đổi cuối

trans-unit.source: Drag and drop on tag or collection
trans-unit.target: Kéo và thả vào từ khóa hoặc bộ sưu tập

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to delete asset "{0}"?
trans-unit.target: Bạn có thực sự muốn xóa tài sản "{0}"?

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to delete collection "{0}"?
trans-unit.target: Bạn có thực sự muốn xoá bộ sưu tập "{0}"?

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to delete tag "{0}"?
trans-unit.target: Bạn có thực sự muốn xóa thẻ "{0}"?
Việc này sẽ xóa các tài sản.

trans-unit.source: This will delete the collection, but not the assets that it contains.
trans-unit.target: Việc này sẽ xóa bộ sưu tập, nhưng không có tài sản chứa trong nó.

trans-unit.source: This will delete the tag, but not the assets that has it.
trans-unit.target: Việc này sẽ xóa các thẻ, nhưng không phải các tài sản nó có.
Thao tác này không thể hoàn tác.

trans-unit.source: The file size of {0} exceeds the allowed limit of {1}
trans-unit.target: Kích thước tập tin của {0} vượt quá giới hạn cho phép của {1}

trans-unit.source: Only some of the files were successfully uploaded. Refresh the page to see the those.
trans-unit.target: Chỉ có một số phần của tập tin đã tải lên thành công. Làm mới trang để nhìn thấy chúng
Gắn thẻ cho các tài sản đã thất bại.

trans-unit.source: Adding the asset to the collection failed.
trans-unit.target: Thêm các tài sản cho bộ sưu tập đã thất bại.

trans-unit.source: Asset could not be deleted, because there are still Nodes using it
trans-unit.target: Asset could not be deleted, because there are still Nodes using it

trans-unit.source: You can replace this asset by uploading a new file. Once replaced, the new asset will be used on all places where the asset is used on your website.
trans-unit.target: You can replace this asset by uploading a new file. Once replaced, the new asset will be used on all places where the asset is used on your website.

trans-unit.source: This operation will replace the asset in all published or unpublished workspaces, including the live website.
trans-unit.target: This operation will replace the asset in all published or unpublished workspaces, including the live website.

trans-unit.source: Currently the asset is used {usageCount} times.
trans-unit.target: Currently the asset is used {usageCount} times.

trans-unit.source: Currently the asset is not in used anywhere on the website.
trans-unit.target: Currently the asset is not in used anywhere on the website.
